title: Dutch colonial prison and theories on race

content.question: The photo above, showing skin-tone evaluation performed on an Indonesian inmate in a Dutch colonial prison in 1933, most clearly exemplifies which of the following?

choices.label: Restrictions of educational opportunities for colonial subjects
Influence of scientific theories on race

content.answer: Influence of scientific theories on race

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
